name: Baldi and his big mack
description:
There is nothing really about this mod, its just a random joke mod that I just made for fun! oh and btw, the characters in this mod were made by xanderstar. And I just turned it into a mod! This mod is just a beta version. Theres a new coming soon to this mod! so yeah i guess...

Oh yeah! I forgot, Credit to splintza for the baldi model!
